pages.text: The hearth is a utility block capable of providing a warming or cooling effect.  Powered by redstone from the sides, and a cold fuel, and it will provide a chilling effect.  Powered by redstone from the bottom or back and it will grant players a warmth effect and consumes hot fuel.

The hearth has an area of effect and is only operational within areas with a roof.  The smokestack is an item that, when placed on a boiler or icebox, lets both provide their requisite hearth-like effects.
